title: Natchez teen charged with murder after game of Russian roulette
content:
NATCHEZ, Miss. -- Police say a Natchez teen is dead and another charged with murder after a deadly gun game early Sunday morning.
Police Detective Jerry Ford tells The Natchez Democrat the shooting happened around 12:30 a.m., when a group of juveniles were playing a game of dominoes.
At some point, Ford said the 17-year-old suspect Jeffery Blanton Jr. decided to play with a revolver, placing a single bullet in the cylinder and spinning it before starting a game of Russian roulette.
Police say Blanton aimed the gun at 17-year-old Justin Williams Jr. Ford said when the gun went off, Williams was hit in the hand and chest.
Adams County Coroner James Lee pronounced Williams dead at 1:10 a.m. Sunday.
Ford said the shooting remains under investigation.
